docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Contents
docs.text: If you want the contents of a .md file appear on the right hand-side menu, add ## sections.

docs.title: Working from another project
docs.text:
The project git repo must be supported by this project.

Its documentation must be inside docs folder and contain .md markdown files.

Optionally project can define nav.yml navigation file which will be included during this docs build and visible on the left hand-side menu.

Sample nav.yml: 

Backend:
- Overview: index.md
- Cart: cart.md
